content.theme: Two blades. One rhythm. Every fight is a performance.
content.design: Dancer augments reward dual wielding and aggressive multi-hit combat styles.

augments.name: Rhythm Tracker
augments.effect: +1 accuracy with dual-wielded weapons if you attacked last turn

augments.name: Blade Balance
augments.effect: While dual wielding light weapons: +1 Evasion

augments.name: Paired Strike
augments.effect: Both weapons hit same target â†’ +1 damage die on second

augments.name: Whirlwind Wiring
augments.effect: 1/combat: attack two different adjacent targets (one each weapon)

augments.name: Counter-Rhythm
augments.effect: After enemy misses you in melee, off-hand gains +2 accuracy

augments.name: Twin Fang Protocol
augments.effect: Off-hand crits trigger a bonus main-hand attack

augments.name: Dance of Blades
augments.effect: While dual wielding, move 1 square after each hit (free)

augments.name: Synchronized Strike
augments.effect: 1/combat: combine both weapons' damage dice in one attack

augments.name: Evasive Flourish
augments.effect: After 3+ hits in one turn, +2 Evasion until next turn

augments.name: Blade Storm
augments.effect: 1/combat: full attack with both weapons against all adjacent enemies

augments.name: Glass Cannon
augments.effect: While dual wielding: +3 damage per die. Armor counts as 0 (trade-off)

augments.name: Tempest
augments.effect: Dual wielding attacks cost 1 less AP each. Off-hand has no accuracy penalty
